Generation VII.Sun: For some reason, only females have been found. It creates a reverse harem of male Salandit that it lives with.
Generation VII.Moon: Filled with pheromones, its poisonous gas can be diluted to use in the production of luscious perfumes.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Salazzle lives deep in caves and forces the Salandit it has attracted with its pheromones to serve it.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: It punishes Salandit that couldn't bring it food with a fierce slap of its flame-spewing palm.

Generation VIII.Sword: Only female Salazzle exist. They emit a gas laden with pheromones to captivate male Salandit.
Generation VIII.Shield: The winner of competitions between Salazzle is decided by which one has the most male Salandit with it.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Salazzle makes its opponents light-headed with poisonous gas, then captivates them with alluring movements to turn them into loyal servants.
Generation IX.Violet: When two Salazzle meet, they will use their pheromone gas to fight over the males in each other's group.

Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Wela Volcano Park , Lush Jungle ( SOS Battle )
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Wela Volcano Park , Lush Jungle (Cave) ( SOS Battle ) Received from Samson Oak at Heahea Beach * ( Totem -sized)

Generation VIII.Sword: Giant's Cap , Stony Wilderness , Dusty Bowl , Lake of Outrage , Hammerlocke Hills ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Motostoke Riverbank , East Lake Axewell , North Lake Miloch , Giant's Cap , Stony Wilderness , Dusty Bowl , Lake of Outrage , Hammerlocke Hills ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Challenge Road ( Wanderer ) Fields of Honor , Loop Lagoon ( Max Raid Battle ) Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure )

Generation IX.Scarlet: South Province: Area Four , Alfornada Cavern North Province: Area One , Area Two , Area Three , Dalizapa Passage , Glaseado Mountain
Generation IX.Violet: South Province: Area Four , Alfornada Cavern North Province: Area One , Area Two , Area Three , Dalizapa Passage , Glaseado Mountain
